name: Mighty Lube® Type CNS Heavy*
description: Mighty Lube® Type CNS Heavy* is a specially designed thin film, anti-wear penetrating lubricant. Specially formulated as a non-staining lubricant, Type CNS Heavy Non Stain Lubricant uses synthetic ester based fluids that provide a semi wet, thin film lubricant which will work at ambient temperatures up to 500°F. Type CNS Heavy Non Stain lubricant will break down other inferior lubricants or carbons and help clean the conveyor.
